Wayne Fontana and The Mindbreaers - The Game of Love

About this song

"The Game of Love" is a 1965 song by Wayne Fontana and the Mindbenders, released in the United States as "Game of Love". It was covered by New Zealand musician Tex Pistol and released in 1987.

The song reached #1 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 and #2 on the UK Singles Chart in 1965.

Source: Wikipedia
